top.title: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
top.summary: Four men expose the horror and brutality of conditions in the Ukraine war, with two saying they saw soldiers being shot for refusing orders.

top.title: Mexico sends thousands of soldiers to stop violence after death of drug lord
top.summary: A wave of violence has erupted across Mexico since a powerful drug cartel boss died following his capture by special forces.

top.title: More than 5,000 flights cancelled as US east coast digs out of record snow
top.summary: A major snowstorm dumps more than a foot of snow in several areas, bringing power cuts and disruption.

top.title: Reddit fined £14m for 'concerning' child age check failings
top.summary: The UK's data watchdog said the failings meant children could be exposed to harmful material online.

top.title: 'The end of Xbox': fans split as AI exec takes over Microsoft's top gaming role
top.summary: The executive shake-up has sparked online debate about new boss Asha Sharma's gaming credentials.

top.title: Porn company fined £1.35m by Ofcom over age check failings
top.summary: Ofcom's £1.35m fine on 8579 LLC is the largest it has levied under the Online Safety Act so far.
